<!--

classDiagram
class alembic_version{
 *VARCHAR<32> version_num NOT NULL
}
class file{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<255> file_name NOT NULL
   INTEGER member_id NOT NULL
   DATETIME upload_date
}
class member{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<200> address
   VARCHAR<120> email NOT NULL
   DATE join_date
   VARCHAR<100> name NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<20> phone
}
class membership{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   INTEGER fk_member NOT NULL
   INTEGER fk_membership_type NOT NULL
   DATETIME membership_end
   DATETIME membership_start NOT NULL
}
class membership_type{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<10> extension_interval NOT NULL
   INTEGER extension_value NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<50> name NOT NULL
   FLOAT price NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<10> price_interval NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<10> term_interval NOT NULL
   INTEGER term_value NOT NULL
}
class note{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   TEXT content NOT NULL
   DATETIME created_at
   INTEGER member_id NOT NULL
}
class user{
 *INTEGER id NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<128> password_hash NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<50> role NOT NULL
   VARCHAR<100> username NOT NULL
}
member "1" -- "0..n" file
member "1" -- "0..n" membership
membership_type "1" -- "0..n" membership
member "1" -- "0..n" note

-->
